languages.text: {n}Символы на их доспехах различаются, обозначая принадлежность к двум разным кабалам. Судя по ядовитым взглядам и натянутым улыбкам, они в любой момент готовы впиться друг другу в горло.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Вы замечаете, что символы на доспехах ксеносов различаются, обозначая принадлежность к двум разным кабалам. Дружеская вечеринка это только видимость — судя по ядовитым взглядам и натянутым улыбкам, они готовы схватиться за любой повод, чтобы впиться друг другу в горло.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The symbols on their armour are different, indicating that these two belong to two different Kabals. If their venomous glares and thin smiles are anything to go by, they are ready to go for each other's throats at any moment.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Символы на их доспехах различаются, обозначая принадлежность к двум разным кабалам. Судя по ядовитым взглядам и натянутым улыбкам, они в любой момент готовы впиться друг другу в горло.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The symbols on their armour are different, indicating that these two belong to two different Kabals. Judging by their venomous glares and thin smiles, they are willing to use any excuse to go for each other's throats.{/n}

{n}The symbols on their armour are different, indicating that these two belong to two different Kabals. Judging by their venomous glares and thin smiles, they are willing to use any excuse to go for each other's throats.{/n}

{n}The symbols on their armour are different, indicating that these two belong to two different Kabals. If their venomous glares and thin smiles are anything to go by, they are willing to use any excuse to go for each other's throats.{/n}

{n}The symbols on their armour are different, indicating that these two belong to two different Kabals. If their venomous glares and thin smiles are anything to go by, they are ready to go for each other's throats at any moment.{/n}

{n}The symbols on their armour are different, indicating that these two belong to two different Kabals. If their venomous glares and thin smiles are anything to go by, they are ready to go for each other's throats at any moment.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Leurs armures sont ornées de symboles différents, indiquant que ces deux xénos appartiennent à deux Kabales distinctes. À en juger par leurs regards venimeux et leurs sourires crispés, ils sont prêts à se sauter à la gorge d'un instant à l'autre.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The symbols on their armour are different, indicating that these two belong to two different Kabals. If their venomous glares and thin smiles are anything to go by, they are ready to go for each other's throats at any moment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Leurs armures sont ornées de symboles différents, indiquant que ces deux xénos appartiennent à deux Kabales distinctes. À en juger par leurs regards venimeux et leurs sourires crispés, ils sont prêts à se sauter à la gorge à la première occasion.{/n}

languages.text: {n}他们的盔甲上铭刻着不同的符号，代表这两个异形来自不同的阴谋团。他们脸上露出了虚与委蛇的笑容，但恶毒的目光却表明了他们真实的想法——他们可能随时会扑向对方的喉咙。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The symbols on their armour are different, indicating that these two belong to two different Kabals. If their venomous glares and thin smiles are anything to go by, they are ready to go for each other's throats at any moment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}他们的盔甲上铭刻着不同的符号，代表这两个异形来自不同的阴谋团。他们脸上露出了虚与委蛇的笑容，但恶毒的目光却表明了他们真实的想法。只要有一丁点机会，他们就会立刻扑向对方喉咙。{/n}

languages.text: {n}鎧に描かれたシンボルはそれぞれ異なっており、この2人がそれぞれ異なる陰謀団に所属していることを示している。その悪意に満ちた視線と薄笑いから察するに、2人は今にも口実を見つけてはお互いをののしり合うことだろう。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The symbols on their armour are different, indicating that these two belong to two different Kabals. If their venomous glares and thin smiles are anything to go by, they are ready to go for each other's throats at any moment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}鎧に描かれたシンボルはそれぞれ異なっており、この2人がそれぞれ異なる陰謀団に所属していることを示している。その悪意に満ちた視線と薄笑いから察するに、2人は今にも口実を見つけてはお互いをののしり合うことだろう。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Symbole auf ihren Rüstungen sehen unterschiedlich aus, also gehören beide wohl zwei unterschiedlichen Kabalen an. Ihre giftigen Blicke und ihr schmales Lächeln lassen darauf schließen, dass sie bereit sind sich jeden Moment an die Gurgel zu gehen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The symbols on their armour are different, indicating that these two belong to two different Kabals. If their venomous glares and thin smiles are anything to go by, they are ready to go for each other's throats at any moment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Symbole auf ihren Rüstungen sehen unterschiedlich aus, also gehören beide wohl zwei unterschiedlichen Kabalen an. Ihre giftigen Blicke und ihr schmallippiges Lächeln lassen darauf schließen, dass sie jede Gelegenheit nutzen würden, um sich gegenseitig an die Gurgel zu gehen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los símbolos que decoran sus armaduras son distintos, lo que significa que pertenecen a diferentes Kábalas. A juzgar por sus sonrisas falsas y sus miradas envenenadas, están dispuestos a sacarse los ojos mutuamente a la mínima ocasión.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The symbols on their armour are different, indicating that these two belong to two different Kabals. If their venomous glares and thin smiles are anything to go by, they are ready to go for each other's throats at any moment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los símbolos que decoran sus armaduras son distintos, lo que significa que pertenecen a diferentes kábalas. A juzgar por sus sonrisas falsas y sus miradas envenenadas, están dispuestos a aprovechar cualquier excusa para sacarse los ojos mutuamente.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Zırhlarındaki sembollerin farklı oluşu, bu ikisinin iki farklı Kabal'a mensup olduğunu gösteriyor. Nefret saçan bakışları ve yapmacık gülümsemelerinden her an birbirlerinin gırtlağına sarılmaya hazır oldukları anlaşılıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The symbols on their armour are different, indicating that these two belong to two different Kabals. If their venomous glares and thin smiles are anything to go by, they are ready to go for each other's throats at any moment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Zırhlarındaki sembollerin farklı oluşu, bu ikisinin iki farklı Kabal'ın üyesi olduğunu gösteriyor. Nefret saçan bakışları ve yapmacık gülümsemelerinden, her an birbirlerinin gırtlağına sarılmaya hazır oldukları anlaşılıyor.{/n}
